text: Tamara Grigoryevna Miansarova (née Remnyova, ; 5 March 1931 – 12 July 2017) was a Soviet and Russian lyric soprano.Тамара Миансарова. Биографияpop singer and professor of Russian Academy of Theatre Arts,Tamara Miansarova official site She best known for her hit May There Always Be Sunshine.Tamara Miansarova bio She was born Kirovohrad, Soviet Union. Miansarova died in Moscow of a pulmonary embolism on 12 July 2017 at the age of 86.Умерла исполнительница песни про «Чёрного кота» Тамара Миансарова ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from pulmonary embolism Category:Soviet singers Category:Russian pop singers
title: Tamara Miansarova
